message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SY, cs.CV 

This paper presents a generic and scalable Reinforcement Learning scheme for Artificial Neural Networks, which is relevant to several sub-categories of computer science. The paper focuses on the learning mechanism of neural networks, which is a core topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of deep learning algorithms, which is a popular topic in computer vision (cs.CV). Additionally, the paper proposes a biologically inspired alternative to backpropagation, which is relevant to the sub-category of systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the use of unsupervised training regimes, which is relevant to the sub-category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
